short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create easily portalable decklists from Scryfall searches!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create card lists from Scryfall searches and card pages.  Click the + button when hovering any card image on Scryfall to add it to the list. 

View your list by opening extension popup. From there you can change card amounts, delete rows or the entire list, and copy the list to your clipboard.
